summary: The test suite implements extensive pytest-based validation for the health simulation framework. It covers configuration fixtures, core simulation engine behavior, population dynamics, disease-specific modules (e.g., ALRI, cancer, malaria, HIV, TB, COPD, etc.), health‑system interactions, consumables, equipment, symptom management, analysis utilities, logging, progress display, and deterministic execution. Each test module isolates a component, creates dummy simulations, runs scenarios, and asserts expected outcomes such as event scheduling, treatment pathways, mortality, resource allocation, and data integrity.
business_intent: Provide automated verification that all parts of the health simulation platform function correctly, maintain model fidelity, detect regressions, and support reliable development and deployment of epidemiological and health‑system analyses.
